parameters.param:
echo "triggered by %teamcity.build.triggeredBy%" echo "repository rest api url: %bitbucket.restapi.url.repositories.workspace.slug.pullrequests%" echo "commit author: %dep.BitbucketMarcospcruzWorkspace_DemoApp_1CheckCommitSAuthorBuild.env.COMMIT.author%" echo "source branch type: %dep.BitbucketMarcospcruzWorkspace_DemoApp_1CheckCommitSAuthorBuild.env.git.branch.source.type%" echo "source branch: %dep.BitbucketMarcospcruzWorkspace_DemoApp_1CheckCommitSAuthorBuild.env.git.branch.source%" CLOSE_SOURCE=false CURRENT_BRANCH="%teamcity.build.branch%" echo %teamcity.agent.jvm.user.name%
#CURRENT_BRANCH="%dep.BitbucketMarcospcruzWorkspace_DemoApp_1CheckCommitSAuthorBuild.env.git.branch.source%" COMMIT_USER="%dep.BitbucketMarcospcruzWorkspace_DemoApp_1CheckCommitSAuthorBuild.env.COMMIT.author%" [ -z $COMMIT_USER ] && exit 1 SUPPORT_BRANCH="support/" case "%dep.BitbucketMarcospcruzWorkspace_DemoApp_1CheckCommitSAuthorBuild.env.git.branch.source.type%" in "feature" ) TARGET_BRANCH="develop" CLOSE_SOURCE=true ;; "develop" ) TARGET_BRANCH="%gitflow.support.support%" CLOSE_SOURCE=false ;; "uat" ) TARGET_BRANCH="release/support-rc" CLOSE_SOURCE=false ;; *) echo "ERROR: Invalid branch type" exit 1 echo skipping creating PR TARGET_BRANCH="" ;; esac echo "target branch: ${TARGET_BRANCH}" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.git.branch.source' value='${CURRENT_BRANCH}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.git.branch.target' value='${TARGET_BRANCH}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.COMMIT.author' value='${COMMIT_USER}']" echo "##teamcity[setParameter name='env.git.pullrequest.close_source' value='${CLOSE_SOURCE}']"
